Instruction: Peel and seed the butternut squash, then cut it into cubes.
In a bowl, toss the butternut squash cubes with olive oil, salt, black pepper, and rosemary until evenly coated.
Spread the cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden brown and tender.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious side dish.
